description: The heart of a shoggoth. You could eat it to master the beast's morphogenic prowess, or you could use it to 'master' the beast in another way.
A glass flask containing a piece of meat that seems to be growing. Occasionally the piece of meat pulsates.

use_action.msg: The flask is threatening to shatter as the meat keeps growing. Use it again to open it and relieve the pressure.

description: The meat inside this flask glows with iridescent colors. It's lightly shivering.

use_action.summon_msg: The odd meat is released from its glass flask prison and begins to rapidly and violently expand, extending numerous disjointed tentacles in every direction. The tentacles intertwine with each other and transform into an organism, resembling a beautiful woman, not quite like the horrible nightmare creature it used to be. She suddenly speaks up: 'Finally, I am able to meet you like this! Thank you for helping me, master!'

description: 'Ah... I think I went overboard and turned out like this. I need some time to return to my former shape. Please warm me up in master's pockets! Don't put me in a fridge! Absolutely not!'

use_action.not_ready_msg: 'Fufufu~ Are you worried? I am fine, your maid is fine! ... I guess. So, please wait a bit longer... I'm sorry for making you concerned.'
use_action.msg: 'I have made a complete recovery! I will serve you well, master! Now, please put me on the ground.'

description: 'What's up? Why haven't you put me on the ground yet? Ah, you want me to stay tiny for a little while longer? Ehh... I suppose it can't be helped.'

use_action.summon_msg: 'Sorry I kept you waiting, master! I will do my best to serve you and support you to the best of my abilities!'

description: A child entrusted to you by the owner of the house you served at. There's a deep feeling of fear in your stomach as you embrace the cataclysm, but protecting this child gives you purpose and makes you feel less alone.

use_action.friendly_msg: Master seemed worried about the state of the neighbors.

description: This is a doll in the shape of your beloved master. By keeping it in your inventory, it slowly gathers maid power.

This is a doll in the shape of your beloved master, but with an additional 'special attachment.' By using it in a certain (rather embarassing) type of private ritual, you can catalyze your powerful desires towards your beloved master into a usable type of energy.

This is a doll in the shape of your beloved master, but with an additional 'special attachment.' By using it in a certain (rather embarassing) type of private ritual, you can release an explosion of desire towards your beloved master and transform it into a usable type of energy.

use_action.msg: You can no longer suppress your feelings and began to intimately press against your master's doll...

description: This is a doll in the shape of your beloved master, but with an additional 'special attachment.' By using it in a certain (rather embarassing) type of private ritual, you can release an explosion of desire towards your beloved master and transform it into a usable type of energy.

use_action.msg: Finally, after your body tightens up and you reach your limit, you collapse on the doll with a delighted and exhausted smile...

description: A set of scrolls and sacrifices used to summon a different kind of maid. Pour the sacrificial sugar in the middle of the magic circle and cast the correct spell.

use_action.friendly_msg: The sacrifical sugar melts at the apex of your casting and starts to spew out white smoke. As the sweet smell spreads around, you notice a shadowy figure about the size of a child standing in the magic circle. After the smoke completely dissipates, a small maid stands in the place of the shadowy figure, staring at you with curious eyes. 'Master?'

description: An even smaller version of your little maid.

use_action.not_ready_msg: While standing still on the palm of your hand, she stares downwards and mutters 'Master...' in a barely audible voice.
use_action.msg: 'Masteeer! Masteeeer!' The little maid taps your shoulder and points towards the ground, as if she wants to get off your shoulder. Put her on the ground when you're ready.

description: Your little maid seems to have made a complete recovery.

use_action.friendly_msg: The little maid jumps down to the ground and turns around, lightly lifting the hem of her skirt and giving you a bow. 'Master!' she says with a smile.

description: A mysterious scroll used to summon some kind of mystery meat and drinking water. It can be used multiple times.
A set of secret maid cookware. By powering it with maid energy, you can create dishes filled with love.
A summoned little maid. She looks and wanders around while holding onto the hem of your clothes tightly. She's afraid of fighting.
Your little maid is in the process of smoking meat. She seems to be having fun.

use_action.not_ready_msg: The little maid tastes the smoking meat and shakes her head a little.
use_action.msg: 'Master! Master!' It seems like your little maid has finished smoking the meat. It smells quite nice. Disassemble to recover the finished product.

description: It seems like your little maid has finished smoking the meat. It smells quite nice. Disassemble to recover the finished product.
Your little maid is in the process of smoking meat. She seems to be having fun.

use_action.not_ready_msg: The little maid tastes the smoking meat and shakes her head a little. Don't tell her what kind of meat it is.
use_action.msg: 'Master! Master!' It seems like your little maid has finished smoking the meat. It smells quite nice. Disassemble to recover the finished product.

name.str: little maid pet (finished smoking human flesh)
name.str_pl: little maid pet (finished smoking human flesh)

description: It seems like your little maid has finished smoking the meat. It smells quite nice. Disassemble to recover the finished product.
Your little maid is in the process of smoking fish. She seems to be having fun.

use_action.not_ready_msg: The little maid tastes the smoking fish and shakes her head a little.
use_action.msg: 'Master! Master!' It seems like your little maid has finished smoking the fish. It smells quite nice. Disassemble to recover the finished product.

description: It seems like your little maid has finished smoking the fish. It smells quite nice. Disassemble to recover the finished product.

A large living mass of meat made alive by the means of alchemy. The twisted, distorted meat lump has a mouth-like organ like that of a human, where it constantly spews poisonous gas and acidic bodily fluids from, while making unpleasant sounds.

use_action.friendly_msg: I have unleashed a disgusting monster...
